Message.Title: henry ford and micheal dell
Message.Msg: saw a show yesterday how henry ford regained control of his company by showing it was going down the tubes while his son was in charge interesting this seems to be the same type of twist on dieing pcs story

Message.Title: No one is taking a billionaire serious
Message.Msg: funny not even a 2 cent gain.

Who cares ? The deal gets done on price. Value is what the winner receives.Only lawyers could come up with that kind of BS. The shareholders will vote or not vote for a sale at the appropriate time. Dell is yesterday's newspaper.
